block.p: SCHONBERGER-Lois. The Officers, Board of Directors, and Staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the passing of Lois Schonberger, beloved wife of our long time friend and supporter, Eli Schonberger. We wish to express our sorrow and deepest sympathy to Eli; to their children Mark, David, and Stuart; their daughters-inlaw Nadine, Diane, and Carmen; and their grandchildren Zach, Alison, Scott, Jacob, Annie, and Talia. James S. Tisch, President Larry Zicklin, Board Chair Barry Effron, Chair, Westchester General Campaign John S. Ruskay, Exec VP & CEO

SCHONBERGER-Lois. The Officers, Board of Directors, and Staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the passing of Lois Schonberger, beloved wife of our long time friend and supporter, Eli Schonberger. We wish to express our sorrow and deepest sympathy to Eli; to their children Mark, David, and Stuart; their daughters-inlaw Nadine, Diane, and Carmen; and their grandchildren Zach, Alison, Scott, Jacob, Annie, and Talia. James S. Tisch, President Larry Zicklin, Board Chair Barry Effron, Chair, Westchester General Campaign John S. Ruskay, Exec VP & CEO
